title: Latest Beats Studio3 Wireless headphone design should be blasted off into space
content:
Six months after unveiling a special edition of the Beats Studio3 Wireless in partnership with Samuel Ross, Beats is releasing a starry Beats Studio3 Wireless headphone.

description: After unveiling a special edition of the Beats Studio3 Wireless six months ago, Beats is releasing a new starry version.
